Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the shoulder section of a red pottery vessel with base of one handle surviving, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with a traces of light-brown wash and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394875) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394875)
